backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with types for song submissions, metadata, album tracks, ACR results, and editing/presave structures, serving as the core domain model for music submission workflows.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions for historical data migration including songs, verification requests, news posts, community messages, podcasts, and artist profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for verification tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files describing their functionality and recent feature additions.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documents the root cause of a deployment failure and details the fixes made to configuration, actor initialization, routing, and restored song submission features.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styling with custom OKLCH color variables for both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point setting page metadata, favicon, root div, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, theme, query client, and authentication flow, showing loading states and profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/AdminArtistManag: Displays and filters artist profiles for admins, with editing controls and profile detail cards.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditArtistD: Modal dialog for admins to edit artist profiles, including photo upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditSubmiss: Modal dialog allowing admins to edit song submissions, validate artwork, upload files, and update metadata.
frontend/src/components/AdminPodcastSubm: Manages podcast and episode submissions, providing approval, rejection, live status updates, and file downloads.
frontend/src/components/AdminSubmissions: Displays and manages all song submissions for admins, supporting sorting, status updates, editing, deletion, and live URL handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminTeamManagem: Renders an admin interface for generating, viewing, and copying unused invite codes. Supports code creation, clipboard copy, and displays creation dates.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserRoleMan: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/AdminVerificatio: Displays and manages verification requests, including approving, rejecting, activating artists, and extending expiry. Shows status badges, alerts, and action controls for each request.
Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/AlbumTracksEdito: Allows adding, editing, and removing album tracks with metadata and audio uploads. Supports upload progress, file conversion, and track list updates.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementPopu: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
Manages artist profile creation and editing with photo upload, social links, validation, and permission checks. Handles upload progress and conditional field visibility.
frontend/src/components/ClaimYouTubeCopy: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/ConnectInstagram: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/DashboardPublish: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with copyright text and a support email link.
frontend/src/components/GeneralSupportTa: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/GreenBadge.tsx: Displays a green badge icon with tooltip labeling the user as an artist. Supports configurable sizing.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with login/logout, theme toggle, and artist profile display. Integrates Internet Identity auth and profile querying.
frontend/src/components/PodcastEpisodeFo: Form component for creating podcast episodes, handling file uploads, metadata inputs, and submission via mutation hooks.
Form for creating podcast shows with metadata fields and artwork upload, submitting via createShow mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Simple modal that collects and saves a user's name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/SongSubmissionFo: Song submission form supporting artwork validation, audio upload, metadata entry, and album track management.
frontend/src/components/UserArtistProfil: Displays and manages user artist profiles, including creation, editing, and deletion dialogs.
frontend/src/components/UserEditSubmissi: Dialog for editing an existing song submission with metadata updates, file re-uploads, and artist matching.
frontend/src/components/UserPodcastSubmi: UI section for users to view, create, and manage their podcast shows and episodes with tab navigation and episode loading.
frontend/src/components/UserSubmissionsL: Displays the user's song submissions with status badges and editing options, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/VerificationBene: Empty component file with no implementation.
Shows benefits of verified status and allows users to apply if not verified or pending, including loading handling.
frontend/src/components/VerificationProm: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/VerificationRene: Displays renewal prompt and benefits list when a user's verified status is expired, with ability to submit renewal.
frontend/src/components/VerifiedBadge.ts: Renders a verified badge icon with tooltip and configurable size.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for song submission, admin actions, user/admin retrieval, and mutation-side toasts with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with guarded access and tabs for artists, submissions, podcasts, and verification.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with login handling and redirects to user or admin dashboards plus feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ThankYouPage.tsx: Displays a thank‑you message after submission and provides navigation back to the user dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: User dashboard with tabs for profiles, song submissions, submission list, and podcast tools.
Utility to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and trigger a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToExternalBlob.ts: Converts a File or Blob into an ExternalBlob with optional upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/isValidUrl.ts: Simple helper to validate URLs by checking http/https prefixes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and syncing URL values with stored values, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Verified Artist system, its requirements, features, and architectural notes for admin and user flows.
